license.comment: Yes, the link points to Open Database License ODbL 1.0.

SDG[0].comment: The project perfectly coincides with the SDG 3: Good Health and Well-being. The SDG 3 ensures healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages and the project(Global Healthsites Mapping) works towards that goal with the use of technology.

clearOwnership.comment: Yes, the link points to `Healthsites.io ip policy` page on github which has overall details of the project including project description, APIs, data models to name a few.

documentation.comment: Yes, the link points to `healthsites` official repository on github which has all the information about the projects including the description, data flow and data model, technology stack used to name a few.

nonPII.comment: The statement provided by the project owner is true. The flow, import and export of data from and to the project is done non-proprietorially. Hence, the statement is valid.
